articles.title: Asia Today: Australia outbreak grows, spreads to New Zealand - Martinsville Bulletin
articles.description: SYDNEY (AP) — Australia’s most populous state reported a record 633 new coronavirus infections on Wednesday as concerns grew about the delta variant's spread beyond Sydney. The previous record in New South Wales, which includes Sydney, was 466 on Saturday.
articles.content:
